  • Method Details

    • setCurrentCustomer

      void setCurrentCustomer(Customer customer)
      Sets the customer context for subsequent operations.
      Parameters:
      customer - The currently logged-in customer.

    • makeBooking

      Booking makeBooking(Customer customer, String slotId)
      Creates a booking for the given customer for a specific slot ID. Implements clash detection and automatically cancels overlapping bookings.
      Parameters:
      customer - The customer who is making the booking.
      slotId - The ID of the time slot to book.
      Returns:
      The newly created Booking object, or null if booking failed.

    • getBookingsForGym

      List<Booking> getBookingsForGym(String gymId)
      Retrieves all bookings for a specific gym.
      Parameters:
      gymId - The ID of the gym.
      Returns:
      A list of bookings.

    • cancelBooking

      boolean cancelBooking(Customer customer, String bookingId)
      Cancels a booking. It verifies that the booking belongs to the provided customer before proceeding.
      Parameters:
      customer - The customer requesting the cancellation.
      bookingId - The ID of the booking to cancel.
      Returns:
      true if cancellation was successful, false otherwise.

    • getBookingsForCustomerId

      List<Booking> getBookingsForCustomerId(String cusTomerId)
